
# requirements.py
# Auto-generated dependency installer for Neuroprompting Streamlit Prototype

import subprocess
import sys

packages = [
    "streamlit>=1.29.0",
    "numpy>=1.26.0",
    "pandas>=2.2.0",
    "scipy>=1.11.0",
    "altair>=5.0.0",
    "pydub>=0.25.0",
    "openai>=1.32.0"
]

for package in packages:
    subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, "-m", "pip", "install", package])

print("All dependencies installed successfully.")
